name: 101 Ways to Die in Alpha Complex
name_original: 101 Ways to Die in Alpha Complex
description:
Hello Citizens! This is The Computer. Welcome to Alpha Complex. Your home since 5,312 lifetimes ago. If you are experiencing memory loss that is just a side effect of the cloning process.

Instructions

Help your friend The Computer as he tries to keep Alpha Complex running smoothly. Use Arrow Keys to move, Spacebar to interact, and 0-9 to select equipment.

How many times will you die?
